insufficient_idle_time.description: Idle window is interrupted by a high-priority task before realignment completes.
response: Restore internal states to pre-pause state.
Log partial realignment for later review.

mascot_data_unavailable.description: Mascot logs are corrupted or unavailable during reflective pause.
response: Log error and notify Introspection for diagnostics.

persistent_misalignment.description: Internal state remains misaligned after multiple reflective pauses.
response: Escalate to Introspection for deeper analysis.
